metadata.title: All-in-One Pack | External Digital Department
metadata.description: The ultimate solution. Maintenance + Analytics + Reputation + Content. Delegate 100% of your digital management to your Tech Partner.

hero.h1_lead: Stop being a 'one-man band'. I am your Digital Partner. You focus on your business, I handle EVERYTHING digital (Data, Image, and Tech) for the price of a company dinner.

stats.label: Coverage
stats.description: Technique, Data, and Image unified under one strategic roof.

stats.label: Partner
stats.description: No anonymous tickets. Direct communication with someone who knows your business.

stats.label: Savings
stats.description: Eliminate the friction and extra cost of managing 3 different providers.

painPoints.title: You don't have time for everything
painPoints.content: Trying to run the business, check Analytics, reply to reviews, and update plugins is impossible. In the end, something fails, and you lose money.
list: Missed opportunities due to lack of time

solution.title: Your External Digital Department
solution.content: We unify the 3 pillars: Technique, Data, and Image. It is the smartest option financially and the one that brings the most peace of mind.

features.title: Authority Plan
features.description: SEO content strategy to grow on both fronts.

features.title: Priority Support
features.description: Direct access to your Digital Partner for strategic consultations.

workflow.title: Your Digital Machinery, Step by Step

onboarding.title: Phase 1: Liftoff
steps: Strategy Meeting: We define your goals and scope (90 min). No jargon.
Activation: We formalize the agreement and I configure your access (GA4, GBP, Hosting).
Execution: Technical tune-up and launch. Your digital ecosystem starts working.

monthlyCycle.title: Phase 2: The Monthly Success Cycle
steps: Week 1 - Monitoring: I track data and ensure everything is technically 100%.
Week 2 - Brand Defense: Active management of reviews and reputation on Google.
Week 3 - Offense (Content): Strategic writing and publishing on the blog to attract traffic.
Week 4 - Accountability: You receive your Visibility Report. We analyze and adjust course.

pricing.title: A Whole Department, One Fee
pricing.content: Hiring this separately (SEO, Tech, Community Manager) would cost you triple. Here you have it unified for the price of a software subscription.

downsell.title: Prefer to take it step by step?
downsell.content: If the 'All-in-One' pack seems like too much to start with, don't worry. Secure the essentials first: the technique.

offer.name: Essential Web Maintenance
offer.description: We ensure your website doesn't break, stays secure, and loads fast for just 25€/mo. The solid foundation to grow later.

ctaFinal.title: The CEO's Decision
ctaFinal.content: For just 20€ more than the other packs, you have total coverage. It is the most profitable investment for your peace of mind.
